attributes.action: Bestow upon GREAT YARMOUTH and its environs CITY STATUS to mark its 800th year of existance as an important north sea port!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Great Yarmouth has existed 800 years in 2008 and is well over due to be recognised as the vibrant historical cosmopolitan city it has become in all but name!
If you care about your communty, its infrostructure and its future development then you should sign this petition!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
